content.heroSubtitle: Experience the taste of homestyle baking
content.aboutSection: Bangalore Bakes brings you the homestyle taste of freshly baked cookies. Based in Bangalore, we use traditional recipes and the finest local ingredients to provide you with a delightful taste experience that feels like home.

initialProducts.name: Classic Chocolate Chip
initialProducts.description: Rich and gooey chocolate chip cookies with a crunch.

initialProducts.name: Red Velvet Surprise
initialProducts.description: Soft red velvet cookies with cream cheese flavor.

initialProducts.name: Oatmeal Raisin Magic
initialProducts.description: Warm, chewy oatmeal cookies dotted with sweet raisins.

logoPrompt: a minimalist logo for a cookie shop featuring a stylized cookie and heart, vector art
